videos.description: Mike Tirico and Jon Gruden break down Michael Vick's performance on Monday Night Football to guide the Steelers past the Chargers.
videos.headline: Exhilarating win for Vick, Steelers on MNF

videos.description: Chargers TE Antonio Gates gets Eric Williams' game ball after catching his 100th career touchdown pass. Jeremy Fowler's game ball goes to Steelers RB Le'Veon Bell after Bell's had the game-winning TD as time expires.
videos.headline: Antonio Gates, Le'Veon Bell awarded game balls
